title: Mark Tran talks to the man who wants to make the Korean DMZ into a nature reserve
content: Mark Tran reports on a plan for a nature reserve in the Korean de-miliarized zone has the backing of Kofi Annan and Nelson Mandela
summary: Mark Tran reports on a plan for a nature reserve in the Korean de-miliarized zone has the backing of Kofi Annan and Nelson Mandela
